testcase.name: Verify user is able to log in and log out successfully - #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given User is on the homepage...............................................passed When User clicks on Signup or Login button..................................passed Then I should see Login to your account.....................................passed When I enter valid email "testuser23@test.com" and password "Akshay2001@"...passed And I click on the Login button.............................................passed Then I should see Logged in as "Testuser"...................................passed When I click on the Logout button...........................................passed Then I should be navigated back to the login page...........................passed

testcase.name: Verify user cannot register with an already registered email - #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given User is on the homepage...............................................passed When User clicks on Signup or Login button..................................passed Then User should see New User Signup! text..................................passed When User enters name "Akshay" and already registered email "bollamakshay756@gmail.com".passed And User clicks on the Signup button........................................passed Then User should see an error message "Email Address already exist!"........passed

testcase.name: User submits the contact form successfully
testcase.system-out: Given User is on the homepage...............................................passed When I navigate to the Contact Us page......................................passed Then I should see the GET IN TOUCH heading..................................passed When I fill in the contact form with details................................passed And I upload a file.........................................................passed And I click the Submit button and accept the alert..........................passed Then I should see the success message Success! Your details have been submitted successfully..passed When I click the Home button................................................passed Then I should be redirected to the home page................................passed

testcase.name: User navigates to the Test Cases page successfully

testcase.name: User successfully subscribes using different emails - #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given User is on the homepage...............................................passed When I scroll down to the Subscription section..............................passed And I enter my email "user1@test.com" and click subscribe...................passed Then I should see the success message You have been successfully subscribed!.passed

testcase.name: User adds a recommended item to the cart and verifies it
testcase.system-out: Given User is on the homepage...............................................passed When User scrolls to the bottom of the page.................................passed Then User should see the RECOMMENDED ITEMS section..........................passed When User clicks Add To Cart on a recommended product.......................passed And User clicks View Cart button............................................passed Then The product should be displayed in the cart............................passed

testcase.name: Verify product removal from cart
testcase.system-out: Given User is on the homepage...............................................passed And I click on View Product.................................................passed When I add a product to the cart............................................passed And click continue shopping.................................................passed And I navigate to the cart page.............................................passed Then I should see the cart page displayed...................................passed When I remove a product from the cart.......................................passed Then I should see the product is removed....................................passed

testcase.name: Verify category navigation for Women and Men products
testcase.system-out: Given User is on the homepage...............................................passed Then I should see categories on the left sidebar............................passed When I click on the Women category..........................................passed And I click on the Dress sub-category under Women...........................passed Then I should see the WOMEN - DRESS PRODUCTS page...........................passed When I click on the Men category............................................passed And I click on the Jeans sub-category under Men.............................passed Then I should see the MEN - JEANS PRODUCTS page.............................passed

testcase.name: Register and complete checkout process
testcase.system-out: Given User is on the homepage...............................................passed When User clicks on Signup or Login button..................................passed When I enter signup details with name "John Doenc" and email "johndoe4098@example.com".passed And I enter account details with password "password123", day "10", month "January", year "1990".passed And I enter address details "John", "Doe", "Company", "123 Street", "Apt 4B", "United States", "California", "Los Angeles", "90001", "1234567890".passed Then I should see account created message...................................passed When I click Continue.......................................................passed Then I should be logged in as a user........................................passed When I add products to cart and go to cart page.............................passed And I proceed with checkout.................................................passed Then I should see address and order review details..........................passed When I enter comment "Please deliver soon" and place the order..............passed And I enter the payment details "John Doe", "4111111111111111", "123", "12", "2025".passed And I confirm order........................................................passed Then I should see success message...........................................passed When I delete the account...................................................passed Then I should see account deleted message...................................passed
